}} 'Deep Freeze', by Faronics, is an application available for the Microsoft
Windows, Mac OS X, and SUSE Linux operating systems which allows system
administrators to protect the core operating system and configuration files on a
workstation or server by restoring a computer back to its original configuration
each time the computer restarts. [http://www.faronics.com/enterprise/deep-
freeze/ Faronics Deep Freeze product page]
